section_title: PROTOCOL ARTICLE 2.3 (adverse impacts of policies and measures)
sentences: This issue was considered by the SBSTA plenary on 31 May and through a joint SBI/SBSTA contact group and informal consultations co-chaired by Andrew Ure (Australia) and Eduardo Calvo Buendia (Peru).
The relevant discussions have been summarized under the SBI agenda item on Protocol Article 3.14 (see page 17).
